Body:
"""
        Test that an InvalidField exception is raised when sign is
        called with a crypto algorithm other than RSA.
        """
engine = crypto.CryptographyEngine()
args = (None, enums.CryptographicAlgorithm.TRIPLE_DES, enums.
    HashingAlgorithm.MD5, None, None, None)
self.assertRaisesRegex(exceptions.InvalidField,
    'For signing, an RSA key must be used.', engine.sign, *args)
